descriptions.400: Your request was written in the Black Speech and cannot be understood.
descriptions.401: You need the key to the Mines of Moria to access this realm.
descriptions.402: The toll to cross this bridge has not been paid.
descriptions.403: You shall not pass! This path is forbidden to all who seek it.
descriptions.404: The path you seek is not marked upon these ancient maps.
descriptions.405: That method will not work in Middle-earth. Try a different path.
descriptions.406: The format you request cannot be found in any of the archives of Gondor.
descriptions.408: The beacons were not lit in time. Your request has timed out.
descriptions.409: There is a conflict between the kingdoms. This resource is contested.
descriptions.410: This realm has been abandoned and its halls are empty.
descriptions.413: Your burden is too great, even for one who has borne the Ring.
descriptions.429: You have traveled too swiftly. Even the eagles need rest.
descriptions.500: A great disturbance has occurred in Middle-earth. The servers of Isengard have fallen.
descriptions.502: The gateway at the Black Gate is not responding.
descriptions.503: The realm is temporarily closed. The King is in counsel.
descriptions.504: The gateway took too long to respond. Perhaps the roads are watched.
descriptions.default: An unexpected journey has led you astray.

footers.400: "A wizard should know better than to speak in riddles."
footers.401: "The way is shut. It was made by those who are dead."
footers.402: "We cannot get out. Drums in the deep."
footers.403: "You shall not pass!" - Gandalf the Grey
footers.404: "Not all those who wander are lost, but this page certainly is."
footers.405: "One does not simply walk into this resource."
footers.406: "I asked for one thing, and they gave me another."
footers.408: "Time is running short. The quest has failed."
footers.409: "There is but one Lord of the Ring, and he does not share power."
footers.410: "The age of Men is over. The age of this page has ended."
footers.413: "The load is too heavy. Cast it into the fire!"
footers.429: "Fool of a Took! Stop making so many requests!"
footers.500: "Something terrible has happened in the depths."
footers.502: "The beacons are lit, but there is no answer."
footers.503: "The steward of Gondor has asked that you wait."
footers.504: "No news from the watchers. The gateway is silent."
footers.default: "The road goes ever on and on..."
